title: fix this now its not even funny anymore
body:
just played a game as maokai top at 17:00 my ping spiked to 500 and "attempting to reconnect" I didn't want to get another one of those bs "low priority" things so I didn't leave it I sat there and waited and waited and waited and waited
then I loaded up YouTube to see if there was anything about fixing this there was nothing
so I restarted league got let into the game as the enemy team surrendered and now im on 20min low priority queue after the client refused to let me back into the game 
just got to say its a load of f*****g b******t and needs to be fixed

replies.body:
Riot recently finished repairing some critical devices for the OCE server. It is possible that this lag is just a reverberation of that lag through the system.

You can attempt sending in a support ticket to Riot about this, but they'll probably argue to you that "it only happens to players who consistently leave games", so be prepared to deal with that.

If you want to be more sure that future games you have won't lag out, come by the boards and check to see if anyone's made a recent post about mysterious lag. Could help you avoid some nasty situations.
